explains: adj. 神气的；得意洋洋的；自信的；活泼的

sentences.en: He wasn't quite as perky as normal.
sentences.cn: 他并不像往常那么高兴。

sentences.en: "I stalked him out," the perky senior told the press.
sentences.cn: “我跟踪到他了。”这个充满活力的老人告诉媒体。

sentences.en: Your smile should appear natural and relaxed, not cheerleader perky.
sentences.cn: 你的笑容要自然放松，不是拉拉队的那种活力奔放。
